name: ABC News Online
overview:
ABC News NOW is an entire network devoted to better living with smart, empowering info you can use everyday From high-tech to high fashion, going green to keeping lean, ABC News NOW is always GOOD TO KNOW.

ABC News’ digital cable network, ABC News NOW, is available on cable, broadband and mobile.

milestones.description: That's not just the best asnewr. It's the bestest answer!
